title: Little Stalker
description: Please note: This title is being prepared for republishing and will be unavailable for a while. Sorry for the inconvenience.College student Coby is being stalked by a young guy and has no idea why, until someone suggests that the stalker may have a crush on him. The idea both excites and terrifies Coby, who is so deep in the closet he can barely manage to think the word “gay” without freaking out.
author: Erica Pike
